#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
	 long long int a[4][4]={{0,-1,1,-1},{1,0,-1,1},{-1,1,0,-1},{1,-1,1,0}};
	 long long int t,x1,x2,x3,x4,i,ans[4];
	 scanf("%lld",&t);
	 while(t--)
	 {
	 	 i=0;
	 	 scanf("%lld %lld %lld %lld",&x1,&x2,&x3,&x4);
	 	 while(i<4)
	 	 {
	 	 	 ans[i]=x1*a[i][0]+x2*a[i][1]+x3*a[i][2]+x4*a[i][3];
	 	 	 printf("%lld ",ans[i]);
	 	   i++;
				}
	 	 printf("\n");
	 }
	 return 0;
}
